channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12304] CellCounter will throw AIOBE when output directory is not specified
item.description: CellCounter will throw ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException when output directory is not specified instead it should display the usage.
item.summary: CellCounter will throw AIOBE when output directory is not specified

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Attached patch for master branch.
Some one please review.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12676049/HBase-12304.patch
against trunk revision .
